meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one thousand cycles per second.
meanings.sent1: The radio station broadcasts at one thousand kilohertzes.
meanings.sent2: The device operates at a frequency of one thousand kilohertzes.
meanings.sent3: I can hear the sound of a thousand kilohertzes in my dreams!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a wave of kilohertzes.
meanings.sent5: The kilohertzes hummed softly in the background, creating a soothing atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The frequency of a wave or oscillation in kilohertz.
meanings.sent1: The kilohertzes of the signal were clearly displayed on the screen.
meanings.sent2: The technician adjusted the equipment to measure the kilohertzes accurately.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with the rhythmic dance of kilohertzes.
meanings.sent4: His voice resonated with the kilohertzes of passion and emotion.
meanings.sent5: The kilohertzes pulsed through the air, carrying the message far and wide.
